events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection, causing visible damage to the front bumper.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident after verification of the incident details and vehicle involved.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the customer for further information regarding the accident.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the customer for photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates for further processing.
Customer submitted the required photos and official police report documenting the details of the vehicle collision.
The investigation team began examining submitted evidence and contacted involved parties to verify the accident circumstances.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and validating the extent of vehicle damage per the submitted claim documents.
A settlement amount covering repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer and is pending their approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and confirmed their acceptance of the terms provided.
The claim was formally approved following the customer's agreement to the proposed settlement terms and conditions.
The approved settlement payment was issued directly to the repair shop as per the customer's instructions.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after confirmation that vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All documentation and records for the auto accident claim were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
